name: Domino's Pizza
description: Domino's is the world's largest pizza company, founded in 1960, that specializes in pizza and other food delivery services. It operates as a public company traded on the Nasdaq and has grown from a single store in Michigan to over 21,700 locations in more than 90 markets globally. Domino's is known for its focus on fresh, made-to-order pizzas and has revolutionized the delivery industry.
visual: A juicy, mouth-watering image of pizza.
